message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $12,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000? I believe this would still reflect the product's worth while allowing me to stay within my financial limits.
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to work within your budget. While $10,000 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $11,000?
